resources.string: Just take a seat & order with Koasta
We\'ll let you know when it\'s ready
Please sign in to get started

Sign in so that we can verify who you are at the bar, and show you your current and previous orders.\n\nWe only keep a record of your name. No other personal information is stored or shared with third parties.
We\'ve sent your activation code to %1$s
Enter it below to complete your account verification
By continuing I agree to Koasta\'s Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
\"That code doesn\'t seem right. Can you check and try again?\"
We couldn\'t reach that number. Can you double check and try again?
Enable location access to discover the bars, pubs and cafes near you
Failed to fetch nearby venues. Please make sure you\'re connected to the internet
Failed to fetch your past orders. Please make sure you\'re connected to the internet
We weren\'t able to fetch the details for this venue. Please try again in a moment.
We weren\'t able to fetch the details for your order. Please try again in a moment.
We weren\'t able to fetch the details for this order. Please try again in a moment.
We were unable to process this order. Please try again later.
We were unable to confirm your order details, please try again later
Google Play Services is currently unavailable. If it\'s updating, please wait until it\'s done and open Koasta again.
You\'ve not placed any orders yet
Life\'s too short for queuing, start treating yourself to table-service instead!
Sorry, there might be a problem with your order
Sorry, there might be a problem with your order
Sorry, there might be a problem with your order
Sit back and relax, we\'ll keep you updated on its progress.
Sit back and relax, we\'ll keep you updated on its progress.
You can now head to the bar. Just show a member of staff this screen to pick it up.
Your order will be brought to your table shortly.
Please see a member of staff to find out more.
Nice job beating the queue! Thanks for ordering with Koasta.
We haven\'t received payment yet. This usually means there was a problem attempting to take payment. Please check with your bank and try again.
We weren\'t able to take payment with the details you provided. Please check with your bank and try again.
Sign in to view your account details
We weren\'t able to fetch this information, please try again later.
Vote for any of these nearby venues and we\'ll do our best to bring them onboard
Sorry about that, but we\'re expanding quickly! Check back soon to see if we\'ve added nearby venues.

We\'ve just launched Koasta - an easy and safe way to order at your favourite bars and pubs.\n\nWe\'re working with local venues around the UK and bringing them onboard. You can help by voting for your favourite venues below.
We were unable to fetch your results, please try again later
Your order contains age-restricted items. Please confirm you\'re 18 years of age or older. You may be asked for your ID when you pick up your order.
Notifications from Koasta about your orders and special offers
Facebook is currently unavailable due to situations out of our control. Please try Sign in with Google, or try again later.

You\'re one of the first few to vote for %s to join Koasta. Once we have enough interest we\'ll start working towards getting this venue onboard.\n\nBy sharing your interest in %s to your friends, you can speed this process up further.

People like you are voting for %s to join Koasta! Once we have enough interest we\'ll start working towards getting this venue onboard.\n\nBy sharing your interest in %s to your friends, you can speed this process up further.
We\'re in talks with %s and hope to bring them onboard soon. Thanks for your support!
This venue will be open later. You can browse the menu until then.
Your order will be brought to your table.
You can pick up your order from the bar when it\'s ready.
